com.intel.icecp.node.security.trust.impl

Class SimpleSymmetricSignatureTrustModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intel.icecp.node.security.trust.impl.SimpleSymmetricSignatureTrustModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TrustModel<SymmetricKey,SymmetricKey>

    public class SimpleSymmetricSignatureTrustModel
extends Object
implements TrustModel<SymmetricKey,SymmetricKey>
    Simple TrustModel for symmetric signing that fetches the symmetric key used for both signing and verification from a given IcecpKeyManager. Keys are trusted by default.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SimpleSymmetricSignatureTrustModel(IcecpKeyManager keyManager) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SymmetricKey fetchSigningKey(URI signingKeyId)
      Fetches and returns a secret key (symmetric or asymmetric) that can be used for asymmetric and symmetric signature (we refer to MAC as signatures, even if this is not the proper name for this operation)
      SymmetricKey fetchVerifyingKey(URI verifyingKeyId)
      Fetches the verification key, and returns it to the caller if sufficiently trusted.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleSymmetricSignatureTrustModel

        public SimpleSymmetricSignatureTrustModel(IcecpKeyManager keyManager)

    • Method Detail

      • fetchSigningKey

        public SymmetricKey fetchSigningKey(URI signingKeyId)
                             throws TrustModelException
        Fetches and returns a secret key (symmetric or asymmetric) that can be used for asymmetric and symmetric signature (we refer to MAC as signatures, even if this is not the proper name for this operation)
        Specified by:
        fetchSigningKey in interface TrustModel<SymmetricKey,SymmetricKey>
        Parameters:
        signingKeyId - Unique ID of the signing key
        Returns:
        Returns an instance of a subclass of SecretKey representing the key to use for signature
        Throws:
        TrustModelException - if the signing key is not found

      • fetchVerifyingKey

        public SymmetricKey fetchVerifyingKey(URI verifyingKeyId)
                               throws TrustModelException
        Fetches the verification key, and returns it to the caller if sufficiently trusted. Key retrieval and trust evaluation depend on the specific trust model
        Specified by:
        fetchVerifyingKey in interface TrustModel<SymmetricKey,SymmetricKey>
        Parameters:
        verifyingKeyId - Unique ID of the verification key
        Returns:
        Returns an instance of a subclass of Key, representing the verification key
        Throws:
        TrustModelException - If the verification key is not found or untrusted
